10.heading: Hogan, Ben.
10.title: "Lucille Van Pelt on the First Tee, Please"
10.author: by Charles M
notes: Summary: Lucy has entered a golf tournament, and worries about playing against Sam Snead, Ben Hogan, and Ike. Charlie Brown reminds her that it's a women's tournament.

This Sunday strip is reproduced as part of a letter to the editor, as evidence that grownups (here only from the shoulders down) sometimes appeared in Peanuts. p. 14 in Hogan's Alley, no. 9 (=v. 3, no. 1) (Summer 2001).

71.title: Hogan's Alley
notes:
Periodical about comics. Hogan's Alley is the setting and sometimes title of the Yellow Kid feature, and listings for this sense of the term follow those for the periodical here below. See also these features of the periodical:
  • The Back Alley
  • The Crossword Puzzle
  • Deja Viewed
  • Gertie Tracks
  • The Hogan's Alley Trivia Quiz
  • Moving Finger
  • Q & A
  • The Quarterly Planet
  • Stripper's Guide
